entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
